This is a collection of vignettes to aid in teaching of undergraduate and graduate courses who utilize R for geospatial analysis.  

```{r fig.align="center", echo=FALSE, fig.width=7, fig.height=7}
knitr::include_graphics("./images/GIS.png", dpi=NA)
```


 This site is available for download from the [Dyerlab Github](https://github.com/dyerlab) site.  Please enjoy and contribute.
